name: Mt. Blizzard
description:
This is a short 8 level platformer about climbing a mountain. It was made for Mini Jam 124, with the theme of warmth.

I made all of the assets, music, and code myself except for a few lines of code I got from stack overflow. If you want to use any of the sprites or music (for some reason), you can find and fork (copy) the game on replit.com here.

Read the How To Play in the game to learn the controls.
